name: Hungarian phone number valid from 2012-02-15
description: Acceptable local number formats are the following:62/123-456 - General number format1/123-4567 - Budapest20/123-4567 - Telenor mobile30/123-4567 - T-mobile31/123-4567 - Tesco mobile (from 2012.02.15)70/123-4567 - Vodafone
